body: The ending is that she was actually bossing all 3 boys around and making them roleplay for her pleasure, this is arguably the greatest NTR manga ever written.

As a Cunnilingus aficionado I personally think that a wide long tongue is better than thin (slim?) long tongue. You might want to lick the vagina covering the most of the surface while stroking it with slow and fast licks in either zigzag or up and down pattern. If you want to stick in something, stick in your dick not a flacid/soft tongue.
